actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 21, 1940, as amended, to remove the ninety day requirement for the submission of general plans and specifications for altering a bridge in accordance with an order of the Secretary of Transportation.

summary.text: Removes the ninety-day requirement for the submission of general plans and specifications for altering a bridge in accordance with an order of the Secretary of Transportation, and provides instead that such submission shall be made within such reasonable time as the Secretary may prescribe.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 21, 1940, as amended, to remove the ninety day requirement for the submission of general plans and specifications for altering a bridge in accordance with an order of the Secretary of Transportation.
